TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InputLanguageChangingEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用的資料類別，以準備變更輸入法 (IME) 或切換由右至左值。You can use the data from the class to prepare to change Input Method Editors (IME) or swap right-to-left values. 您也可以變更執行緒的和屬性以便取得挑選不同的資源。You can also change a thread's and properties so that different resources get picked up. 若要防止變更輸入的語言，請設定屬性`true`。To prevent the input language from changing, set the property to `true`. 識別要求的輸入的語言，以及新的輸入語言的字元集。An identifies the requested input language and the character set of new input language. 屬性會識別要求的語言的地區設定。The property identifies the locale of the requested language. 事件之前事件。The event precedes the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`Form1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Form1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#401](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#401)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#401](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#401)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定，定義一組使用者喜好設定的資訊取決於使用者的語言、 次語言、 國家/地區和文化特性的慣例。The property specifies a that defines a set of user preference information dependent on the user's language, sublanguage, country/region, and cultural conventions. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`Form1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Form1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
